thread.title: TPSC Recruitment 2017 – Dairy, Scientific Officer & Other Posts
thread.title_full: TPSC Recruitment 2017 – Dairy, Scientific Officer & Other Posts

author: freejobalert.com
title: TPSC Recruitment 2017 – Dairy, Scientific Officer & Other Posts
text: 2. Scientific Officer: 03 Posts 3. Dairy Officer: 04 Posts 4. Assistant Statistical Officer: 03 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be maximum 50 years for Post 1, up to 40 years for post 2 to 4 as on 22-04-2017. Age relaxation 05 years is applicable to SC/ ST/ PH category candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master Degree in Science/ Humanities/ Arts with 50% marks, M.Ed with 55% marks or M.A in Education with 55% marks, B.Ed with at least 55% marks, Ph.D in Education, 10 years teaching experience for Post 1, at least Bachelor Degree in Science with Honours in Chemistry for Post 2, B.Sc (Dairying)/ B.Sc (D.T)/ B.Tech (D.T) from any recognized university/ Institution for Post 3 & Degree in Statistics/ Mathematics/ Economics/ Commerce from a recognized university for Post 4. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Screening/ Personality Test. Application Fee: For Group A: Candidates should deposit Rs. 200/- for General Candidates & Rs. 150/- for ST/ SC/ BPL card holders/ Physically Handicapped Candidates to the Account No. 31176521319 of the State Bank of India (core banking branches) in favour of the Secretary, Tripura Public Service Commission. For Group B: Candidates should deposit Rs. 150/- for General Candidates & Rs. 100/- for ST/ SC/ BPL card holders/ Physically Handicapped Candidates to the Account No. 31176521319 of the State Bank of India (core banking branches) in favour of the Secretary, Tripura Public Service Commission. For Group C: Candidates should deposit Rs. 100/- for General Candidates & Rs. 50/- for ST/ SC/ BPL card holders/ Physically Handicapped Candidates to the Account No. 31176521319 of the State Bank of India (core banking branches) in favour of the Secretary, Tripura Public Service Commission. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their duly filled in application in the prescribed format, 2 copies of recent passport size photographs, copies of self attested certificates, self addressed envelope bearing postage stamp of Rs. 5/- is to be submitted to the Reception Counter of the TPSC Secretariat on or before 22-04-2017 by 05.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Application: 22-04-2017 by 05.00 PM. For more details like scale of pay, important information, qualification, experience & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Application Form – TPSC Recruitment 2017 – Forest Ranger Posts: Tripura Public Service Commission (TPSC) has issued a notification for the recruitment of Forest Ranger vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 11-04-2017 by 05.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below… TPSC Vacancy Details: Name of the Posts: Forest Ranger Name of the Category:
